app_title.description: The title of the Moose Tabs extension

extension_description.message: Chrome extension that tracks tab hierarchies and parent-child relationships

action_title.description: Title for the browser action button

error_retry_button.description: Button text to retry after an error

error_communication.description: Error message when communication with background script fails

no_tabs_available.description: Message shown when there are no tabs to display

tab_count.description: Message showing number of open tabs

tab_item_aria.message: Tab: $TITLE$. Press Enter to select, drag to reorder.

tree_aria_label.description: ARIA label for the tab tree

refresh_button.description: Button text to refresh the tab hierarchy
